scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,android "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend" "npm run android --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:android: concurrently -n backend,frontend,android "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend" "npm run android --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:android:reset: concurrently -n backend,frontend,android "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run start:reset --prefix frontend" "npm run android --prefix frontend"
